thread.title: Simple Form Tweaks to Make Running Feel a Thousand Times Easier
thread.title_full: Simple Form Tweaks to Make Running Feel a Thousand Times Easier

author: Carly Graf
title: Simple Form Tweaks to Make Running Feel a Thousand Times Easier

organizations.name: global head coach of nike+ run club

text:
All photos 
The quickest way to run better and longer—without cranking up your training or mileage—is to iron out any kinks in your form. "If you consistently focus on making some very small changes each time you hit the pavement, you'll see major progress in your pace and endurance in just a few runs," says Chris Bennett, Global Head Coach of Nike+ Run Club. Follow his head-to-toe pointers to really fly. Photo: Chris Fanning
